the image getting the color temperatures
to match the true-to-life look of the
scene but white balance can also be used
creatively to dramatically alter the
feeling of your shot a warm white
balance can give your image a peaceful
content or calm feeling like an
evocative memory of a summer afternoon
it can trigger feelings of trust joy and
optimism a cooler greeny blue white
balance can give your image maybe an

what we need to do is change it to 16
